code: import React from'react';import classes from'./Brands.module.css';import nikesb from'./images/nikesb.png';import jordan from'./images/jordan.png';import nike from'./images/nike.png';import newbalance from'./images/newbalance.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Brands=function Brands(){var brands=[{name:'NIKE',image:nike,url:'/brands/nike'},{name:'NIKE SB',image:nikesb,url:'/brands/nike-sb'},{name:'NEW BALANCE',image:newbalance,url:'/brands/new-balance'},{name:'JORDAN',image:jordan,url:'/brands/jordan'}];var handleNavigationClick=function handleNavigationClick(url){window.location.href=url;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.brands__wrapper,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.brands__title,children:"\u0411\u0420\u0415\u041D\u0414\u042B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.brands__title,children:"\u0421\u041C\u041E\u0422\u0420\u0415\u0422\u042C \u0412\u0421\u0415"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap'},children:brands.map(function(brand,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:classes.brand__navigation,style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(brand.image,")"),backgroundSize:'cover'},onClick:function onClick(){return handleNavigationClick(brand.url);},children:brand.name},index);})})]});};export default Brands;
